description_for_human: Unforgeable cryptographic safety guardrails for OpenClaw agent skills. Get safety classifications with zkML proofs.
description_for_model: SkillGuard evaluates the safety of OpenClaw skills using a zkML classifier. Send a skill name or full metadata to /api/v1/evaluate to get a safety classification (SAFE, CAUTION, DANGEROUS, MALICIOUS) with confidence scores and a zero-knowledge machine learning proof. Use /api/v1/verify to verify a proof. Payment: Bearer API key or x402 USDC on Base.
